item.title: [HELP] [Rep++] Need Help [PIC]
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

case 59138:
if(c.interfaceGame == 1)
c.triggerTele(3428, 3537, 0);
c.killMyNPCs();
c.resetfollowers();
c.frame61(0);
if(c.interfaceGame == 2)
c.triggerTele(3428, 3537, 0);
c.killMyNPCs();
c.resetfollowers();
c.frame61(0);
break;

item.title: [HELP] [Rep++] Need Help [PIC]
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

[quote=“9d n 1 n e, post:3, topic:273779”]use texthandler.java to name it what you want…
go into clickingmost.java and under case 59138: before the break add

if(c.interfaceGame == 2) c.triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0); <-- "xxxx" , "yyyy" are the coords of the place you want it to teleport to. c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); c.frame61(0);
hope i helped…[/quote]

i found out that, that case is the same as my slayer teleport tab… is it possible to change a case number?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2009, 09:13:16 am[/size][hr]Fixed the “Signlink Variable” 4 Erros left there
